titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 1039) to amend section 37 of the Mineral Lands Leasing Act of 1920 relating to oil shale claims, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-81.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 340 - 0 (Record Vote No: 156).

bill.summary: 5/5/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1039 (oil shale claims).
